name: Torch Investigation
description: Player learns to examine the torches carefully and discovers the anomaly in the northern torch

objectives.primary: Player discovers the northern torch behaves differently
secondary: Understand the torch can be manipulated

available_actions.description: Look at all four torches carefully
available_actions.success_outcome: Player notices the northern torch flickers differently
available_actions.failure_outcome: Player sees torches but misses the difference

available_actions.description: Focus specifically on the different torch
available_actions.success_outcome: Player discovers the torch sconce seems slightly loose

available_actions.failure_outcome: Death from fire - torch ignites oil, chamber fills with smoke

ai_guidance.prompt_emphasis: Reward careful observation, punish reckless actions

character_behavior.echo: Encourages systematic approach, warns against violence

ai_guidance.environmental_responses: Chamber responds positively to gentle investigation
